divs: sighting detailsmy dad and i were in the car going down a somewhat busy street on a friday night. i am always looking at the sky in hopes of seeing a ufo. well i always end up seeing weird lights, and immediately classify those lights as jets\planes\stars\satellites. well friday night we were cruising down the road and i notice a star. i take a quick look at it, and see the bright starlight shutoff, and then the light came back on. as if it was pulsating or blinking. as we come to a stop, i realize it is moving pretty fast across the sky. i try to keep watch and tell my dad to pullover, he is not interested so we keep driving. i try to keep watch as trees and buildings pass by, but i lose sight of it. i finally convince him to pullover at a baseball field, as we turn down the street we come up to a round a bout. as we are circling the round about i see 1 star in the sky. within about 2 seconds, i see that 1 star split into 2 stars and the second star descended rapidly, then ascended and came back together with the original star. then once again it split into 2 stars and the bottom star descended and disappeared. so i told my dad to rush to the field, i get out of the car and quickly run out to observe the sky. i see nothing but stars and airplanes. i know i saw something, its just the timing was off. we didnt get to the field fast enough. as far as im concerned we never have ufo sightings in raleigh.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Raleigh
There was one other sighting in Raleigh on or around October 14th 2011
